meanings.definition: A type of pasta in the form of flat ribbons
meanings.sent1: I cooked fettuccini for dinner last night.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant served delicious fettuccini with Alfredo sauce.
meanings.sent3: The kids giggled as they twirled their fettuccini around their forks.
meanings.sent4: Her hair flowed like fettuccini in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight gleamed on the fettuccini, making it look golden.

meanings.definition: A dish made with fettuccini pasta, typically served with a creamy sauce
meanings.sent1: My favorite meal is chicken fettuccini Alfredo.
meanings.sent2: The Italian restaurant's specialty is fettuccini carbonara.
meanings.sent3: The fettuccini dish was so creamy, it felt like a hug in a bowl.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the fettuccini dish filled the entire kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The fettuccini dish was a symphony of flavors in my mouth.

meanings.definition: To cook or prepare fettuccini pasta
meanings.sent1: I will fettuccini the pasta before adding the sauce.
meanings.sent2: She fettuccinied the noodles perfectly al dente.
meanings.sent3: He fettuccinied the pasta with such precision, it was like watching an artist at work.
meanings.sent4: The chef fettuccinied the dish with a sprinkle of fresh herbs.
meanings.sent5: Fettucciniing the pasta requires attention to timing and texture.
